termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.introduction: Welcome to Redbee. These terms of service govern the use of our digital content platform. By using Redbee, you agree to comply with these terms.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Redbee, you agree to be legally bound by these terms of service. If you do not agree to these terms, you should not use our services.

services.title: 2. Description of Service
services.content: Redbee is a platform that allows creators to share exclusive content with their audiences. We provide tools to create, monetize, and distribute digital content.

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.content: You must create an account to use certain services. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and for all activities that occur under your account.

content.title: 4. User Content
content.content: You are responsible for all content you post on Redbee. By uploading content, you warrant that you have the necessary rights and that the content does not violate any law or third-party rights.

payment.title: 5. Payments and Billing
payment.content: Creators can set prices for their premium content. Payments are processed securely through third-party payment providers. Fees and refund policies are specified separately.

prohibited.title: 6. Prohibited Use
prohibited.content: You may not use Redbee for illegal activities, harassment, spam, malware distribution, or any activity that violates these terms or applicable laws.

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account at any time for violation of these terms. You may cancel your account at any time from your profile settings.

disclaimer.title: 8. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Redbee is provided 'as is' without warranties. We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from use of our services.

changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes through the app or by email.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about these terms, you can contact us at admin@redbeeapp.com

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: At Redbee, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

dataCollection.title: 1. Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly (such as profile data), information about your use of the platform (such as videos watched), and technical information (such as IP address and device type).

dataUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
dataUse.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, personalize your experience, process payments, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations.

dataSharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with service providers, to comply with legal obligations, or with your explicit consent.

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

userRights.title: 5. Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, delete, or export your personal data. You may also object to certain data processing. Contact us to exercise these rights.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze platform usage, and provide personalized functionalities. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

thirdParty.title: 7. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Our platform may integrate third-party services (such as payment processors). These services have their own privacy policies that we recommend reviewing.

dataRetention.title: 8. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your information only for as long as necessary for the purposes described in this policy, or as required by law. Data from deleted accounts is securely erased.

international.title: 9. International Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred and processed in countries outside your location. We implement appropriate safeguards to protect your information in these transfers.

children.title: 10. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are directed to users over 13 years old. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: 11. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes through the app or by email.

contact.title: 12. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or the processing of your data, contact us at privacy@redbeeapp.com
